mapper.insert: insert into streets (m_id, r_start_time, r_end_time, r_distance, r_time, r_speed, r_kcal) values (#{m_id}, #{r_start_time}, #{r_end_time}, #{r_distance}, #{r_time}, #{r_speed}, #{r_kcal})
mapper.select: select * from streets where m_id = #{m_id} and r_date LIKE CONCAT('%', #{r_date}, '%') and r_status = '공개'
select * from streets where m_id = #{m_id} and r_status = '공개'
mapper.delete: update streets set r_status = '비공개' where r_num = #{r_num}
